commit message:
Remove oAuth jars from classpath

Put external jars in the libs folder in zandy/app

Merge pull request #84 from rouzbeh/master

A very small change in the classpath to remove hard-coded paths to oAuth libraries.

Remove oAuth jars from classpath

Put external jars in the libs folder in zandy/app

moved file storage to Android data folder

also made use of defined cache directory.
These changes prevent cluttering the base directory of the sdcard as recommended in android documentation.

Merge pull request #86 from megatron-me-uk/c67e23853452fc4cc41b24f621af4e792995a86b

moved file storage to Android/data/com.gimranov.zandy folder

Move oauth network interaction away from UI thread.

Network io causes exceptions in android >3.0.
